change_language_title:
Chon ngon ngu ban muon su dung
va nhan nut xac nhan de hoan thanh
change_theme_title:
Chon che do mau ban muon su dung
va nhan nut xac nhan de hoan thanh
login_subtitle: Truy cap bang dieu khien de quan ly ho so chung chi de dang.
login_helper: Su dung tai khoan quan tri de xem va duyet yeu cau chung chi.
login_side_heading: He thong quan ly chung chi hien dai
login_side_description: Theo doi ho so, phe duyet chung chi va cap nhat theo thoi gian thuc cho cac nhom.
login_highlight_caption: Tu dong hoa kiem chung va giam 40% thoi gian xu ly.
